survey_name: Local Grocery Store Shopping Habits Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand customer shopping habits, preferences, and satisfaction levels with local grocery stores to help improve services and product offerings.

questions.question_text: How often do you shop at your local grocery store?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you shop at your local grocery store?

questions.question_text: What are the primary reasons you choose to shop at your local grocery store? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.

script.question_text: What are the primary reasons you choose to shop at your local grocery store? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please specify any other reasons for shopping at your local grocery store:
questions.client_notes: Open-ended text field to capture additional reasons. Ensure mobile-friendly input.

script.question_text: Please specify any other reasons for shopping at your local grocery store:

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the overall shopping experience at your local grocery store? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction rating. Ensure labels are clear.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the overall shopping experience at your local grocery store? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)

questions.question_text: Which of the following product categories do you purchase most frequently at your local grocery store? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes with a limit of 3 selections. Include an 'Other' option.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with max selection limit (MULTI_CHOICE)

script.question_text: Which of the following product categories do you purchase most frequently at your local grocery store? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: Please specify any other product categories you frequently purchase:
questions.client_notes: Open-ended text field for additional categories.

script.question_text: Please specify any other product categories you frequently purchase:

questions.question_text: How important are the following factors when choosing a grocery store? (Rate each factor from 1 = Not Important to 5 = Very Important)
questions.client_notes: Use a matrix question with Likert scale for each factor. Ensure mobile-friendly display.

script.question_text: How important are the following factors when choosing a grocery store? (Rate each factor from 1 = Not Important to 5 = Very Important)

questions.question_text: Have you noticed any changes in your local grocery store's product offerings or services in the past 6 months?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge awareness of changes.

script.question_text: Have you noticed any changes in your local grocery store's product offerings or services in the past 6 months?

questions.question_text: If yes, please describe the changes you've noticed:
questions.client_notes: Open-ended text field for detailed feedback.

script.question_text: If yes, please describe the changes you've noticed:

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see at your local grocery store?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture customer suggestions.
